title: Senior Front End Engineer
description: Build consumer product for web, ios, and android.

title: Front End Engineer
description: Built new features and maintaining the stack on the e-commerce side of the web application. Built internal tools to support the content side of the product. User flow build-outs including search, shop galleries, checkout, pricing, coupons, payments, subscriptions, account management, and dynamic site messaging. Integrate analytics to track user's interaction within the platform. Incorporated A/B testing to measure new feature performance.

title: Software Engineer, Team Lead
description: Planned, built, tested, and delivered a custom CMS web application marketed towards media buying solutions. Built highly performant and scalable software systems. Led a team of engineers by managing  projects, deadlines, and deliverables. Discussed, researched, tested, and implemented UX/UI best practices.

title: Software Engineer
description: Built numerous client facing systems with a wide range of technologies. Communicated closely with designers and product owners on how to streamline internal workflows. Collaborated with the CTO on defining best practices and technologies to use within the engineering team.
